lines.text: Thank you - and you have a nice trip back to planet Earth.
I think you've put too much make-up on me.
There is no such thing as too much make-up.
You don't call losing a husband a bummer.
A bummer, Doris, is what you are right now.
I'm getting married and I want you girls to be there.
We've never missed one of your weddings.
I'm giving fifty. It goes down 25 dollars with each marriage.
